DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Effusion and/or Serum Tumor Marker Test Performed Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The name of the effusion and/or serum tumor marker test performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Effusion And/Or Serum Tumor Marker Test Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._A collection of fluid in a body cavity, which may be the result of a non-neoplastic disorder (e.g. heart failure) or a tumor (e.g. carcinoma of the lung)._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._A laboratory test in which a monoclonal antibody is used to detect a tumor-specific marker in a blood sample._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredName: Effusion And/Or Serum Tumor Marker Test Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: A collection of fluid in a body cavity, which may be the result of a non-neoplastic disorder (e.g. heart failure) or a tumor (e.g. carcinoma of the lung).:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:A laboratory test in which a monoclonal antibody is used to detect a tumor-specific marker in a blood sample.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: A collection of fluid in a body cavity, which may be the result of a non-neoplastic disorder (e.g. heart failure) or a tumor (e.g. carcinoma of the lung).
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
A laboratory test in which a monoclonal antibody is used to detect a tumor-specific marker in a blood sample.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
